name: Chris Grasing
title: About Me
components: Nice to meet you!

My name is Christopher Grasing. I'm current junior pursuing Computer Science here at Stony Brook University. My dad was the one who got me into programming from a young age. He is current a systems automator at Metlife. I enjoy the exact things you would expect from a CSE major; I like to play video games, board games and drink beer. Sometimes even doing all three at once. I also love to read.
I have a German Shepherd named Henry.
I love anything Lord of the Rings related.
